description:
nova v3 diagnostics api returns a NotImplementedError , but it is not caught by api.

[tagett@stack-01 devstack]$ nova --os-compute-api-version 3  diagnostics f1
ERROR (ClientException): Unexpected API Error. Please report this at http://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/ and attach the Nova API log if possible.
<type 'exceptions.NotImplementedError'> (HTTP 500)

libvirt driver doesn't implement get_instance_diagnostics, it raise an NotImplementedError ,but v3 api doesn't handle it .
it returns http 500, but should be 501
title: nova v3 api raise a  exceptions.NotImplementedError instead of error message

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/110219
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=cc910afb260ab78bfc2568c686f723bff53aa37f
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit cc910afb260ab78bfc2568c686f723bff53aa37f
Author: Eli Qiao <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jul 29 13:50:51 2014 +0800

    Handle NotImplementedError in server_diagnostics v3 api
    
    In libvirt driver, it doesn't implement the function of
    get_instance_diagnostics().it returns http 500 error No.
    we expect http 501 if the function is not implemented.
    
    Change-Id: I59bfaa27b96284bd56917096e0c3fab0d277ba96
    Closes-Bug: 1349680
